participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and curious, with a passion for marine life and crime mysteries.
participant_1.background: I would like to work for the Smithsonian. I hate winter and the cold. I once swam with manta rays. My favorite show is CSI.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, with a tendency to joke around and a love for socializing over drinks.
participant_2.background: I like to place blame on other people even when I know it is my fault. I am from San Francisco. I am always the one who buys the beers. My beer gut is so huge I have not seen my feet in two years. I like to smell my own farts.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Not much, just hanging out. I'm from San Francisco, so I'm used to the cold, but I'm not really a fan of winter. What about you?
I'm doing well. I'm from Chicago, so I'm used to the cold too, but I still hate it. I've always wanted to swim with manta rays, though. That sounds amazing!
It was really cool. I went on a scuba diving trip to the Galapagos Islands, and we saw a bunch of manta rays. They're so graceful and beautiful.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to the Galapagos Islands.
You should definitely go! It's a beautiful place.
I'll have to put it on my bucket list.
What's your favorite show?
My favorite show is CSI. I love crime shows.
Me too! I love the way they solve the mysteries.
Me too! It's so satisfying to see the bad guys get caught.
I know, right?
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to go out to bars and drink beer. I'm always the one who buys the beers.
That's cool. I like to go out to bars too, but I don't drink beer. I'm more of a whiskey drinker.
I like whiskey too, but I don't drink it as often as I drink beer.
I know what you mean. Beer is just more social.
Exactly!
So, what's your favorite beer?
My favorite beer is Sierra Nevada Pale Ale.
I've never had that one. Is it good?
It's one of my favorites. It's a little hoppy, but it's not too bitter.
I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! I think you'll like it.
